job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of data engineering, which involves preparing and managing data for use, aligning with the definition of data collection and structuring.
This refers to the practical application of technical knowledge to build and deploy solutions, a fundamental aspect of software development.
This task involves the design and oversight of the data infrastructure, which is a key responsibility within data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up the CI/CD pipeline in a secure way considering privacy constraints
job_tasks.justification: Setting up CI/CD pipelines is a core MLOps task, and the mention of security and privacy constraints further emphasizes operational aspects of deploying and maintaining systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying solid software engineering way of working in the projects
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the application of software engineering principles, fitting directly into this category.

job_tasks.phrase: Setup monitoring for generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring AI models in production is a key MLOps/LLMOps responsibility, ensuring their performance and health.

job_tasks.phrase: making the new solutions bring increased capabilities to agent and customer
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of integrating technical solutions to enhance user capabilities, aligning with the integration aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating an internal chatbot for agents to better answer customer questions
job_tasks.justification: Developing a chatbot, especially one that answers customer questions, directly involves interacting with and leveraging language models, fitting the GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving solutions to summarize and label why customers contact us
job_tasks.justification: Summarization and labeling are common tasks for LLMs, indicating a focus on generative AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Making updates to our website (FAQ) and chatbot to use more interactive capabilities of GenAI
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions using interactive capabilities of GenAI for website and chatbot updates, pointing to prompt engineering and generative AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: tackling setting up solid monitoring of generative AI solutions and scaling to responds to many agents and customers
job_tasks.justification: Setting up monitoring and scaling for AI solutions are core MLOps/LLMOps responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: Eagerness for growth and embracing challenges.
We value 'Culture Add' over 'Culture Fit'. We are not recruiting clones. We're interested in what unique qualities you bring to our team, data universe and culture.
Empathic, decisive, humorous, people-focused, authentic, and honest.
At Odido we learn every day. All of us. You are responsible for your own development. That is why you decide how, what and when you learn.

profile.rationale: The role involves a significant amount of core software engineering tasks (implementing technical solutions, CI/CD, API creation, software engineering way of working) and data engineering tasks (understanding, collecting, structuring data, managing data architecture). Crucially, it also has a strong focus on Generative AI specific tasks such as creating chatbots, summarizing/labeling customer interactions, using interactive GenAI capabilities, and setting up monitoring for generative AI models. The technologies mentioned (Python, AWS, Azure OpenAI services, generative AI models) also support this classification. The balance between software engineering and GenAI specialization, with a clear emphasis on GenAI applications, points to the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear about the responsibilities, required skills, and the specific AI technologies involved. The objectives and challenges directly map to GenAI tasks, and the distinction between core engineering and AI specialization is well-defined within the text.
